Articles.Content: It's the parts, planets, resources, etc that make up the base game.  What you would get with a fresh install.
Basically, the game is built so modular that even the stock content is just another module plugged into the base framework.

This is extremely useful if, as a modder, you want to understand the structure of config files of similar parts: just take the stock ones, copy them, and edit them!

Edited February 9, 2017 by VikingStormtrooper
